This class is a part of the facade pattern layer.

Constructs the class of the company facade and creating new relevant DBDAO objects for the use of the facade with the DBDAO objects.

CouponSystem - Class in connection

CouponType - Enum in javaBeans
the class is for creating the seven coupon types options for the coupon type.
createCompany(Company) - Method in interface daoLayer.CompanyDAO
 
createCompany(Company) - Method in class daoLayer.CompanyDBDAO
This method creates the company's record into the Mysql data base, using the received company parameter.
createCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
This method activates the createCompany method in the companyDBDAO class while sending the received company parameter, eventually creating the company's record into the Mysql data base.

This method activates the createCoupon method in the couponDBDAO class while sending the received coupon parameter, eventually creating the coupon's record into the Mysql data base.
